about_the_game:
Welcome to "Delivery Point Simulator"!
In this captivating delivery point simulator, you will become a true logistics tycoon. Manage your own delivery point, receive and hand out packages, upgrade infrastructure, and expand your capabilities to become the best in the business!

Game Features:

1. Receiving and Handing Out Packages:

Your delivery point will become a crucial link in the delivery chain. Pick up packages from the warehouse cooperative and hand them to satisfied recipients. Manage customer flows to avoid queues and delays.

2. Purchasing Licenses for New Products:

Expand the range of services offered at your point. Purchase licenses for new types of packages and goods to attract more customers and increase revenue.

3. Upgrading the Delivery Point:

Invest earned money in upgrading your delivery point. Increase its area, add new equipment, and hire staff to improve efficiency and service speed.

4. Logistics and Transport:

Buy vehicles for faster and more efficient delivery. Upgrade your transport fleet and develop optimal routes to minimize costs and increase profits.

5. Banking Operations:

Don’t forget about finances! Deposit money in the bank at interest to grow your savings. Use loans and invest funds in business development.

6. Strategic Planning:

Apply your strategic thinking skills to become a market leader. Analyze demand, competition, and economic trends to make the right decisions and achieve success.

In "Delivery Point Simulator," you will experience the exciting world of logistics and business management. Start your journey from a small delivery point to a logistics industry giant! Ready to take on the challenge and become a true tycoon? Then let's go to new heights!

highlighted.name: WELL, THE FIRST MONTH IS OVER

name: Delivery Point Simulator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows (64-bit) 10
  • Processor: i5 3550 / RYZEN 5 2500X
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 / AMD R9 270X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows (64-bit) 10
  • Processor: i5 7600K / Ryzen 5 2600x
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD RX 480
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Welcome to "Delivery Point Simulator"!Manage a parcel pickup point: receive and deliver packages, improve infrastructure, purchase licenses for new products, manage transportation, and invest money in the bank. Become a leader in the logistics industry!
supported_languages:
English, Simplified Chinese, Russian*
*languages with full audio support
